name: dino-validation
description: Easy clientside form validation in vanilla JS
author: Adam Smith <cadamsmith.dev@gmail.com> (https://cadamsmith.dev)

scripts.ci: npm run build:ci && npm run check-format && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run type-check && rollup -c --configPlugin typescript
scripts.test: npm run type-check-tests && npx playwright test
scripts.test:firefox: npm run type-check-tests && npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:chrome: npm run type-check-tests && npx playwright test --project=chrome
scripts.test:webkit: npm run type-check-tests && npx playwright test --project=webkit
scripts.size: npm pack --dry-run && echo '' && echo 'Individual file sizes (gzipped):' && for file in dist/dv.js dist/dv.min.js dist/dv.esm.js; do gzip -c $file | wc -c | awk -v name=$(basename $file) '{printf "  %-15s %6.1f KB\n", name, $1/1024}'; done
